roleset.name: face, cover with asphalt
roleset.note: ASPHALT-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire (from asphalt.01-v)

role.descr: asphalt itself, type of pavement used

example.name: typical usage
example.text: He asphalted a lot of roads here.

example.name: Interesting content, transitive
example.text: The legend is von Braun didn't want to mow his grass so he asphalted most of his lawn and painted it green.

example.name: All arguments, invented example
example.text: After John went missing, Mary asphalted a mysterious bump in the driveway with a home-made concoction of oatmeal and Elmer's glue.
example.arg: a mysterious bump in the driveway
with a home-made concoction of oatmeal and Elmer's glue

roleset.name: pave, cover with asphalt
roleset.note: ASPHALT_OVER-V NOTES: Roleset based on automatic frames created. Framed by Claire. (from asphalt.02-v)

role.descr: location, entity being covered in asphalt

example.name: No asphalt mentioned.
example.text: Here in Pennsylvania they asphalted over half a dead deer by the side of the road.
example.arg: half a dead deer by the side of the road
